programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: This gritty action thriller follows an ex-con tattoo artist as he fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter, who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Jim Carrey's strong performance drives this inspired satire of the media. He plays the unwitting star of a reality-TV show chronicling his life; Linney costars as his wife; and Ed Harris netted a Best Supporting Actor nomination as the show's director. Peter Weir directed and received an Oscar nomination of his own. Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone, Holland Taylor.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Win Win
programme.desc: In this moving comedy-drama, struggling small-time lawyer Mike (Paul Giamatti) makes an unethical decision to make some extra money from an elderly client, which unexpectedly results in Mike taking care of the old man's troubled grandson. The boy soon becomes the best member of the high-school wresting team he coaches, but Mike's improper actions could become public when the boy's mother returns looking to take custody of her son and her father. Written and directed by Thomas McCarthy.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars in this action-packed caper film from director John Frankenheimer. Upon his release from prison, a car thief (Affleck) is drawn into a complex casino heist by a mysterious woman (Charlize Theron) and a sadistic criminal (Gary Sinise). Ehren Kruger wrote the script. Clarence Williams III, Isaac Hayes, Dennis Farina, James Frain, Donal Logue.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: An intense character study about two motorists whose lives become intertwined after a fender bender on a New York expressway.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Gripping and ripping remake of the 1957 Western about a small-time rancher (Christian Bale) escorting a murderous outlaw (Russell Crowe) to a rendezvous with the law and a train that will take him to prison. Meanwhile, the desperado's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader, because without him they're "like a pack of dogs without a master." Directed by James Mangold, from a 1953 short story by Elmore Leonard. Ben Foster, Gretchen Mol, Dallas Roberts, Alan Tudyk, Peter Fonda.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Man of the Year
programme.desc: This hilarious political satire asks the question: What would happen if one of the country's funniest men became its most powerful? Robin Williams stars as a comedian who runs for president on a larkâ€”and wins.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive
programme.desc: In this stylish indie film, Adam, a bloodsucker who makes a living as a reclusive musician, reunites with the love of his life, a fellow vampire named Eve, in downtrodden Detroit. They eventually receive a visit from Eve's irresponsible sister, who irritates Adam and causes trouble with the one human with whom the depressed musician gets along.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A divorced masseuse romances a genial empty nester, but starts to question their relationship due to her bitter client's ramblings about her loathsome ex-husband in this poignant romantic comedy.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: In this fantastical, poignant comedy, a man who spends much of his time lost in elaborate daydreams goes on an adventure around the world in order to retrieve a photo negative that the magazine he works for needs.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: A Rodeo Film
programme.desc: A Black bull rider in rural California must choose between his brother and the woman he loves.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
programme.desc: In this marvelously funny comedy, a has-been Las Vegas magician reunites with his old partner in order to take on a hip illusionist with a flair for dangerous theatrics.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham

Nagra) whose dreams of athletic stardom clash with the wishes of her traditional Sikh family. The title refers to British soccer phenom David Beckham. Gurinder Chadha directed. Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys-Meyers, Anupam Kher, Alan Paxton, Juliet Stevenson, Shaheen Khan, Ameet Chana.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: 28 Weeks Later

Now the infected have returned, more deadly than ever. Robert Carlyle and Catherine McCormack star as parents trying to keep their two children out of harm's way. Directed by Juan Carlos Fresnadillo, who co-wrote the script with JesÃºs Olmo, Rowan Joffe and E.L. Lavigne.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Valkyrie

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Fighting
programme.desc: Channing Tatum stars as a small-town kid inducted into the violent world of bare-knuckle boxing in this tense and gritty urban drama. Arriving in New York City with nothing but the shirt on his back, Shawn MacArthur earns a living by selling counterfeit goods on the street. Later, he crosses paths with crafty con artist Harvey Boarden, who offers to help the uneasy newcomer make some cash on the bare-knuckle circuit. Shawn quickly makes a name for himself by taking down every opponent he faces.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this well-executed adaptation of Robert Ludlum's bestselling thriller. The story centers on an amnesiac CIA assassin who embarks on a desperate race to save his own life after he is deemed expendable by his superiors. Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen, Brian Cox, Adewale Akinnouye-Agbaje, Julia Stiles.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: In this rip-roaring sequel, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A self-centered man learns he has an autistic older brother he never knew about after their father dies and leaves the older brother the bulk of his multi-million dollar estate. The younger brother takes his institutionalized sibling on a road trip hoping to get some of the money for himself, but soon the two make a genuine connection.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Because I Said So
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Diane Keaton teams up with rising star Mandy Moore in this charming romantic comedy about an overprotective mom whose plan to find the perfect man for her youngest daughter backfires. Gabriel Macht, Tom Everett Scott, Lauren Graham, Piper Perabo.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Helen Mirren's Oscar-winning portrayal of Britain's Queen Elizabeth II propels this sharply intelligent reimagining of the royalty's response to the death of Princess Diana in 1997.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan and Salma Hayek star in this thrilling and romantic adventure about two semiretired jewel thieves who plan one last heist. Woody Harrelson costars as the determined FBI agent who wants to bring them down.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Joe
programme.desc: In this gripping, atmospheric rural drama, a poor boy from a deeply troubled family finds a father figure in a laborer named Joe, who hires him to work on his crew. However, Joe is also an ex-con with an explosive temper, and a feud with a local man threatens to be his undoing.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Dolapo Is Fine

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Head Full of Honey
programme.desc: With the passing of the wife of a man with Alzheimer's disease, his symptoms slowly get worse and his granddaughter attempts to comfort and help him during his time of need. In an attempt to make him feel important again, he travels with her grandfather to Venice as a final tribute to his wife and their relationship.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A grizzled older cop is removed from a car theft case and partnered with a younger detective, but that doesn't stop him from interfering with the investigation, leaving his new partner stuck in between doing what's right and doing his job.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Bobby and Peter Farrelly co-directed this irreverent comedy about conjoined twins. Greg Kinnear and Matt Damon star as Walt and Bob, brothers who literally stick together through thick and thin. That bond is tested, however, when Walt becomes an actor in Hollywood.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in this adaptation of Isaac Asimov's classic sci-fi stories, a thrilling blend of high-tech effects and slam-bang action. Smith plays a cop who uncovers a conspiracy involving murderous robots in 2035, but he's unable to get anyone to believe him.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Jackie Brown

Jackson, Robert Forster, Bridget Fonda, Michael Keaton, Robert De Niro, Michael Bowen, Chris Tucker, Lisa Gay Hamilton.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: The lives of three burnt-out Brooklyn cops violently converge when a girl goes missing in this tough and gritty thriller.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of Solomon Northup, a free black man in 1800s New York who was kidnapped and forced into slavery on a plantation near New Orleans. Later, he fights for his freedom with the help of a Canadian abolitionist.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Halle Berry's Oscar-winning performance highlights this wrenching tale about racism, redemption and the power of love. She plays a poor Southern waitress who falls for a prison guard (Billy Bob Thornton) following the execution of her husband (played by rapper Sean Combs). Peter Boyle, Heath Ledger.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Cymbeline
programme.desc: In this innovative, modern adaptation that reimagines Shakespeare's drama as a conflict between dirty cops and ruthless bikers, a schemer bets that he can seduce a friend's wife, whose father is a fearsome criminal.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max
programme.title: Neh

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] Five Star Max

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] TV Land HDTV (East) - TVLAND
programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A beloved, multi-Emmy-winning series about Army surgeons cutting up amid the Korean War. 'War is hell. So is TV,' said Larry Gelbart, who developed the series for TV from the 1970 Robert Altman film. ' 'M*A*S*H' and the medium,' Gelbart added, 'were made for each other.' For 11 years (10 in the Top 20), the show deftly blended sharp, thoughtful humor with moving scenes of dedicated, stressed doctors trying to save lives---while clinging to their own sanity---in a Mobile Army Surgical Hospital.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] TV Land HDTV (East) - TVLAND
programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright and his three sons (by three wives) ride herd over the sprawling Ponderosa spread in 1860s Nevada in one of the most handsomely mounted and beloved series of all time. The first TV Western to be shown in color, it ran for 14 seasons; was the top-rated show for three of them (1964-65, '65-66 and '66-67); had a number of first-rank directors (including Robert Altman) work on some episodes; and inspired several 'Bonanza' TV-movies (none especially distinctive).

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] TV Land HDTV (East) - TVLAND
programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: This landmark adult Western centered on Marshal Matt Dillon of Dodge City. John Wayne turned down the lead, suggesting James Arness (who remained for its entire run). Originating on radio (with William Conrad as Dillon), it moved to TV in September 1955. Its popularity spawned a number of copycats, but none would enjoy the longevity (and few the consistent quality) of this classic.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] TV Land HDTV (East) - TVLAND
programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gentle humor and genuinely likable characters made Mayberry a beloved fixture on the TV landscape. A Top 10 hit throughout its eight-year run (it went out at No. 1), this low-key, down-home sitcom harkened back to a simpler time and place. Mayberry may be a state of mind, but the sunny optimism and simple virtues it represents have actually been set in stone--in a Raleigh, N.C., statue depicting Sheriff Andy Taylor and his son, Opie. '[The show's] central theme was love,' Griffith said.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise reunited with director Cameron Crowe ("Jerry Maguire") for this mind-bending remake of the 1997 Spanish drama "Abre los ojos." Cruise plays the heir to a publishing fortune whose life is turned upside down after a horrific car accident. During his recovery, fantasy and reality begin to blend in his mind. Cameron Diaz, Penelope Cruz, Jason Lee, Kurt Russell, Noah Taylor.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: In this chilling psychological thriller, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a killer at a mental asylum located on an island currently in the path of a major hurricane. As Teddy's investigation continues, he suspects the asylum's doctors are performing dangerous experiments and he begins to fear that there might be a supernatural presence on the island.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: House of Gucci
programme.desc: Over the course of three turbulent decades, the Gucci family of Florence develops a luxury fashion brand. Yet as the family continues on its meteoric rise, it is plagued by deceit, vengeance, and murder. Based on the book by Sara Gay Forden.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this highly stylized 1998 thriller directed by Brain De Palma. Cage plays a crooked cop investigating the assassination of the Secretary of Defense, who was shot at a championship boxing match in Atlantic City. As the investigation proceeds, he is forced to realizes that one of his closest friends (Gary Sinise), a Navy commander, may have been involved.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.sub-title: War of the Worlds (S3 E7): Episode Seven
programme.desc: Adina's plan for world destruction is reaching completion. The heroes are in the alternate world under attack. Both sides must make great sacrifices if they are to save humanity.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Georgetown
programme.desc: Ulrich Mott is a middle-aged man scrambling to establish a political career for himself in Washington D.C. One day, he meets Elsa Brecht, an octogenarian journalist who decides to give him a chance. It doesn't take her long to fall in love with him, and soon, the two get married. As Ulrich utilizes Elsa's connections for his personal gain, Elsa's daughter Amanda begins to question and oppose the union. However, everything is upended when Elsa is found murdered in her own home.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Diane Keaton are dynamic in this witty romantic comedy. Nicholson plays an aging Lothario with a young girlfriend. He meets his soul mate, however, when he's introduced to his lover's mother, a playwright who can't stand the sight of him.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: Gully
programme.desc: Three boyhood friends find their escape from LA's tough streets in one out-of-control night of partying. But when the rampage stops, retribution begins. Kelvin Harrison Jr., Charlie Plummer.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)

programme.desc: In this delightful animated adventure, Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Mane 6 must go on an epic journey to defend their homeland of Equestria from fearsome invaders. Along the way, the ponies make a number of new friends, including a pirate crew.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)
programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: This dazzling revisiting of the H.G. Wells sci-fi classic is deftly directed by the author's great-grandson Simon Wells. State-of-the-art effects propel the tale of a scientist (Guy Pearce) who invents a device that allows him to travel through time. But when he goes 800,000 years into the future, he finds a world ruled by ferocious mutant hunters. Jeremy Irons, Sienna Guillory.

programme.channel: [Frontier TV New York] EPIX HDTV (East)

programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.
